exercises: Barbell Bench Press: 4 sets of 6-8 reps with 90 seconds rest
Incline Dumbbell Press: 3 sets of 8-12 reps with 75 seconds rest
Decline Dumbbell Press: 3 sets of 8-12 reps with 75 seconds rest
Dumbbell Flyes: 3 sets of 12-15 reps with 60 seconds rest
Overhead Triceps Extension: 3 sets of 10-15 reps with 60 seconds rest
Close-Grip Bench Press: 3 sets of 8-12 reps with 75 seconds rest
Barbell Squats: 4 sets of 6-8 reps with 120 seconds rest
Romanian Deadlifts (RDLs): 3 sets of 8-12 reps with 90 seconds rest
Leg Press: 3 sets of 12-15 reps with 75 seconds rest
Leg Extensions: 3 sets of 15-20 reps with 60 seconds rest
Hamstring Curls: 3 sets of 15-20 reps with 60 seconds rest
Calf Raises (Standing or Seated): 4 sets of 15-20 reps with 60 seconds rest
Rest or Active Recovery (Light Cardio, Stretching)
Barbell Overhead Press: 4 sets of 6-8 reps with 90 seconds rest
Lateral Raises: 3 sets of 10-15 reps with 60 seconds rest
Front Raises: 3 sets of 10-15 reps with 60 seconds rest
Bent-Over Rear Delt Flyes: 3 sets of 12-15 reps with 60 seconds rest
Pull-ups (or Lat Pulldowns): 3 sets to failure (or 8-12 reps) with 75 seconds rest
Barbell Rows: 3 sets of 8-12 reps with 90 seconds rest
Face Pulls: 3 sets of 15-20 reps with 60 seconds rest
Deadlifts: 1 set of 5 reps, 1 set of 3 reps, 1 set of 1 rep with 180 seconds rest between each set (focus on form, gradually increase weight)
Pull-ups (or Lat Pulldowns): 3 sets to failure (or 8-12 reps) with 75 seconds rest
Barbell Rows: 3 sets of 8-12 reps with 90 seconds rest
Seated Cable Rows: 3 sets of 10-15 reps with 75 seconds rest
Bicep Curls (Barbell or Dumbbell): 3 sets of 8-12 reps with 60 seconds rest
Hammer Curls: 3 sets of 10-15 reps with 60 seconds rest
Rest or Active Recovery (Light Cardio, Stretching)
Optional: Full Body Circuit (Choose 6-8 exercises like push-ups, squats, rows, planks, etc. Perform 3 rounds of 10-15 reps per exercise with short rest periods between exercises and rounds).
